snippet.title: Chimera - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3069320/Chimera/

Graft limbs off of powerful creatures, battle against fearsome bosses, and make your escape as you journey to the top of a mysterious tower in Chimera, out now!

We are Croc Pot Games, a new indie studio formed fresh from college releasing our capstone project and debut title! If you like Chimera, please consider supporting us by checking out the game on steam and following our socials below!

Follow Croc Pot Games:
Twitter: https://x.com/CrocPotGames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@crocpotgames
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/CrocPotGames/
